title: .eco domains: the home of the environmental community online
description: Find your perfect .eco domain name and join the .eco community. A .eco domain name shows that you care about the planet. .eco is the global top-level domain for the environmental community.

business.head: .eco is for businesses and products
business.subhead: that help people make better choices every day

people.head: .eco is for people
people.subhead: who participate in and support environmental action

tld.head: .eco is a domain name extension
tld.subhead: for those committed to positive change for the planet

cop.head: World leaders are in Glasgow for COP26
cop.subhead: Join 2,257 .eco members in supporting climate action

eligibility.head: Can I get a .eco name?
text: Yes, you can! If you care about the planet, a .eco domain name is a great way to show it. You can get a .eco domain name for your business, your non-profit organization or for yourself.
To be eligible for a .eco you must:
• Be commited to working toward a sustainable future
• Be willing to disclose the environmental actions you are taking
If you have any questions or concerns about your eligibility, please contact us.

purchase.head: How do I get my .eco name?
text: Get your .eco domain name in 4 simple steps:
• Take the .eco pledge and create your .eco profile
• Set up and launch your web site

support.head: Support
text: Let us know if you have any questions about .eco!
We are available to chat during business hours Pacific Time.
You can also leave us a message and we will try to respond within 1 business day.
You can also check out the support articles on .eco support site.
